item.title: An important read! ‚ÄúBiden is wasting no time preparing to put...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

An important read! ‚ÄúBiden is wasting no time preparing to put in place his thoroughly anti-worker, ultra-militarist government. At the time of this writing, the New York Times is reporting that long-time Biden aide Antony Blinken has secured the position of Secretary of State. Blinken was Deputy Secretary of State during Barack Obama‚Äôs presidency, where he was an advocate for some of the most destructive policies undertaken by the administration including the war on Libya and... military strikes against the Syrian government. Earlier in Blinken‚Äôs career, when he was a top aide to then-Senator Joe Biden, he advocated the colonial-style partition of Iraq along sectarian lines. Michele Flournoy, the frontrunner to be named Secretary of Defense, recently wrote an article where she emphasized how important it was that the U.S. military be able to credibly threaten to sink all Chinese vessels in the South China Sea in 72 hours.‚Äù

See MoreDesperately-needed reforms under an administration so thoroughly imperialist and reactionary can only be secured through determined, militant struggle. #Biden #wallstreet

liberationnews.org

Biden to unveil cabinet picks: Hyper-militarist, pro-Wall Street...

item.title: üåü Don‚Äôt miss tonight‚Äôs study group on women and the mass...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

üåü Don‚Äôt miss tonight‚Äôs study group on women and the mass incarceration system! Register now at bit.ly/breakchains1123 üåü

Two of our hosts for tonight‚Äôs event, Lillian House and Eliza Lucero, along with fellow PSL organizer Joel Northam, were recently arrested and imprisoned in retaliation for their leadership in the mass protest movement demanding Justice for Elijah McClain. They were illegally detained for eight days, under 23-hour lockdown in COVID-exposed jail units. They now face multiple extreme false felony charges with potential sentences of decades in prison.

We are asking that attendees make a minimum $5 donation for this event that will go towards the legal and political fund for the Denver organizers‚Äô defense effort. Donations can be made at pslweb.org/donate4denver or venmo: @donate4denver.

item.title: Inmates in a Colorado prison are following the political...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Inmates in a Colorado prison are following the political prosecution of the Denver anti-racist organizers and express solidarity with the Party for Socialism and Liberation and the Frontline Party for Revolutionary Action.

In a letter to the PSL, inmate Toney Brown writes, ‚ÄúI would like to take this opportunity to express to you how much of a inspiration it was to see and hear some of the messages and views of demonstrators out there on the front lines of protest. It empowere...d us here in the C.D.O.C. to take similar actions of non-violent protest, of taking a knee here in front of the administration building of the facility as a sign of support of our fellow liberators the many of you which was and are still in protest. ... Today we are all in a prison in this country, some just have the appearance of more liberties than others. I am sure you may agree that a call to action must include a call to unite, no matter of the location.‚Äù

#DropTheChargesCO

See More
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: Today we called an emergency action in response to recent...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Today we called an emergency action in response to recent changes Governor Polis made to the definition of the state's investigation into Elijah McClain's death. We recognize the real possibility that these changes are laying the groundwork for the investigating attorney general Phil Weiser to return with watered down charges against the killer cops, which the public will be expected to accept as a symbolic victory when it really maintains the impunity of the police to brutal...ize and kill at will.

Anyone who has seen what they did to Elijah knows this was murder. We demand nothing less than murder charges against Randy Roedema, Jason Rosenblatt, and Nathan Woodyard. We have seen too many times how these investigations end with the killer cops walking free to sit back and see how this plays out.

This was our message today to Polis and to Weiser: we are still here, we will not be duped, you do not get the benefit of the doubt, and we will continue to fight until we see Justice for Elijah McClain!

See More+16

item.title: PSL organizer Joel, who is facing decades in prison for leading...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver was live.

PSL organizer Joel, who is facing decades in prison for leading peaceful protests for #JusticeforElijahMcClain: ‚ÄúToday marks 447 days since Elijah McClain was murdered. And in those 447 days, the institutional power brokers in the city of Aurora and the state of Colorado have done everything in their power to prevent justice from coming to the killers. The only reason they haven‚Äôt succeeded yet is because we have been here fighting them every step of the way.‚Äù #EyesonWeiser

1K Views

item.title: The PSL‚Äôs 2020 LaRiva campaign made major strides for the...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

The PSL‚Äôs 2020 LaRiva campaign made major strides for the socialist movement. ‚ÄúSo far, La Riva has received more than 83,000 votes, not including the yet-to-be-counted write-in votes in 13 states. That surpasses the 74,027 votes she received in 2016. It is a remarkable vote, especially with total censorship of third-party candidates by the media monopolies. Not one third-party candidate received significant national coverage. It is the highest total for any revolutionary soci...alist candidate for president in over 40 years.

There was a palpable fear of a Trump re-election among many voters who would normally reject both Democratic and Republican candidates and vote for a socialist candidate. This year many opted for Biden.

Yet despite the obstacles and challenges, our socialist campaign was successful in injecting a revolutionary working-class program into the electoral arena. We reached many hundreds of thousands of people with this truth: Only a socialist, sustainable society can truly resolve the inherent problems that capitalism creates: poverty, racism, war and climate change.‚Äù

Read the full statement!

See More+4

Support our comrades facing prison time for organizing for #JusticeforElijahMcClain by attending this virtual Breaking the Chains study group on women & mass incarceration, benefiting their defense fund! ‚û°Ô∏è‚û°Ô∏è‚û°Ô∏è bit.ly/breakchains1123

We will read and discuss articles on the unique oppression of trans women in prison, racism and sexism in the U.S. court system, and cruelty in ...ICE detention centers.

More info: From Capitalist Cages to Socialist Liberation: Breaking the Chains Study Group ‚Ä¢ Part 2

If you can't make the event, you can donate to the fund at pslweb.org/donate4denver or via Venmo @donate4denver

item.title: Watch this extremely important webinar live now! No new Cold War...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Watch this extremely important webinar live now! No new Cold War with China!

Pivot To Peace was live.

Join us on November 14th at 12pm PT | 1pm MT | 3pm ET for a compelling panel discussion of Chinese Americans united to reject the new US cold war against China....

Racial scapegoating of Chinese-Americans and Asian Americans continue to rise as a consequence of relentless and pervasive China-bashing. The panel of highly respected members of the Chinese-American community will address the history and legacy of anti-Chinese racism in the United States, the current revival of Anti-China hysteria, which is closely linked to the US-China cold war, the organic relationship between U.S. militarism and violence here at home, and why we must pivot to peace, not war with China.

The panel will propose ways for the US and China to work together under a multilateral formula for world peace and reject US efforts to provoke war with China under any circumstances.
This webinar will be hosted by the newly formed Pivot to Peace, and is sponsored by Chinese Consolidated Benevolent Association and Chinese for Affirmative Action.

Visit www.peacepivot.org to sign on to the mission statement, and for more info!

See More
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: DROP ALL THE CHARGES ON ANTI-RACIST ORGANIZERS IN THE DENVER...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

DROP ALL THE CHARGES ON ANTI-RACIST ORGANIZERS IN THE DENVER AREA! - HOW YOU CAN HELP

On Sept. 17, police agencies in the Denver area arrested anti-racist organizers in a coordinated assault. People were arrested in a Home Depot parking lot, at their homes, and after they were pulled over while driving. Those arrested were the leaders to demand justice for Elijah McClain, who was brutally murdered by the Aurora Police Department. They are still in jail, with the exception of ...one person. They are facing multiple felony charges and years in prison in an obvious frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain.

Add your name to sign the petition and join the campaign to demand that all the charges be dropped!

Petition text:

"I demand that all charges be dropped on anti-racist organizers in the Denver area. It is an obvious political frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain."

You can also donate for legal and political support for the PSL organizers who were arrested: pslweb.org/donate4denver

If you are a community leader or a member of an organization you can sign our solidarity statement: pslweb.org/denverorgsolidarity

If you can support in person, you can join our emergency demonstration demanding the dropping off all charges: https://facebook.com/events/s/dropthechargesco-march-and-ral/775179416359489/?ti=icl
